downloadTitle: Forefront Identity Manager Connector for SharePoint User Profile Store
downloadDescription: Forefront Identity Manager Connector for SharePoint User Profile Store helps you synchronize identity information to the User Profile Store in SharePoint.
detailsSection:
Forefront Identity Manager Connector for SharePoint User Profile Store helps you synchronize identity information to the User Profile Store in SharePoint.

Supported server versions:
  • Microsoft SharePoint Server 2013
  • Microsoft SharePoint Server 2016
  • Microsoft SharePoint Server 2019
systemRequirementsSection:
Minimum Requirements
  • The Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5
  • Forefront Identity Manager 2010 R2 Service Pack 1 (SP1) or a later version including Microsoft Identity Manager 2016
installInstructionSection: Click on the download link to start the download. Save the MSI to your server. Refer to the TechNet Documentation for how to install and configure the Connector.
